name: GetAsanaGoalDetails
description:
Fetches detailed information for a specific Asana goal.

This tool retrieves the complete record of a specified goal in Asana, including associated time periods and custom field settings. It requires the necessary permissions: 'goals:read', 'time_periods:read', and 'custom_fields:read'.
